alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson County through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fannett, or 8 miles northeast of Hamshire. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, China, Fannett, and La Belle. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 850 and 834. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
